attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern,

My husband and I are in the process of adopting an orphan from China. The wait
from time of application to referral has lengthened signifigantly since we started
this process in January of 2006. We are very concerned with the possibility of the
increase in fees by USCIS. Having to re-file another I-171H form and be
refingerprinted is a huge (an unexpected) financial burden as it is, but to increase
the fees does not seem fair at all. Please do not add this extra cost and stress
for adoptive families who have already had to go through so much to bring their
precious children home! Pease do your part to help us share the love of a family
with an orphan who has so little! Thank you very much for your time and
consideration concerning this issue.

Sincerely,

Amy E. Hatfield
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy E. Hatfield
